channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s Border Success Proves Republicans Never Had To Negotiate Our Sovereignty

item.title: Defense Secretary Hegseth working with DOGE to cut the 'BS'
item.description: Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth released a video on social media explaining upcoming department changes.

item.title: Trump's DOGE stays on track after pair of federal judge rulings
item.description: A pair of federal judges, in two separate cases, filed rulings that allow DOGE to continue its track of finding government waste and slashing it.

item.title: Trump appoints Alice Marie Johnson 'pardon czar' during Black History Month event at White House
item.description: President Donald Trump on Thursday appointed Alice Marie Johnson "pardon czar."

item.title: Chainsaw-wielding Elon Musk makes ‘Dark MAGA’ appearance with Javier Milei at CPAC
item.description: Wearing a “Dark Gothic MAGA" hat Elon Musk made a surprise appearance at the Conservative Political Action Conference (CPAC) Thursday evening.

item.title: Kash Patel Confirmed With A Popular Mandate To Clean House At Corrupt FBI
item.description: Patel enters with eyes open to the bad actors that cost this nation millions in bogus political investigations.

item.description: "'What are you going to do if they put you on leave?' I’m like, 'Go to the beach on the taxpayer’s dime.'"

item.title: A Texas-Sized School Choice Bill May Be a Model for Other States
item.description: The legislature finally appears ready to pass a bill creating $1 billion in education savings accounts.

item.title: McConnell Pledges to Spend Remaining Years in Senate Attending to ‘Unfinished Business’
item.description: Republicans expect a competitive GOP primary race to fill his seat in 2026.

item.title: The Democrats Double Down on Bidenism
